name: kudocoin-bot
description: A bot that give others kudos from you

scripts.deploy: yarn run build && gcloud --project $GCLOUD_PROJECT functions deploy $npm_package_config_FUNCTION_NAME --trigger-http --runtime nodejs10 --region $GCLOUD_REGION
scripts.deploy2: yarn run build && gcloud --project $npm_package_config_GCP_PROJECT functions deploy $npm_package_config_FUNCTION_NAME --trigger-http --runtime nodejs10 --region $npm_package_config_GCP_REGION --service-account $npm_package_config_FUNCTION_SERVICE_ACCOUNT --set-env-vars=OPSGENIE_API_KEY=$OPSGENIE_API_KEY
